entry.title: [SBG5][Private/Public Network] - SBG0506A01D
entry.content:
Jul 10, 17:38 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 10/07/2023 16:14 UTC
End time : 10/07/2023 17:34 UTC
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power suply.

Jul 10, 16:40 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 10, 16:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/07/2023 16:14 UTC
Service impact : All servers are unreachable on this rack
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: VPS - DE2 - host1263508
entry.content:
Jul 10, 07:03 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 7, 13:16 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host1263508

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
any inconvenience caused while we resolve this issue.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
